text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Eremplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>10. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Leüchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> † <PRIZE>5. parsed.explanation: The XML contained two types of errors: 1. A typo in a closing tag where `</PRICE>` was used instead of `</PRIZE>` for item 6. 2. Multiple instances of malformed character sequences (e.g., `\u221a\u00bacher`, `\u221a\u00fc`, `\u221a\u2020`, `\u221a\u00a7`) which were corrected to their proper German umlauts (ü, ä, ß) or the dagger symbol (†). There were 13 such character sequence corrections and 1 closing tag correction, totaling 14 corrections.
